task.title: Save Report Outline
task.shortdesc: Save a custom report design for future use.

taskbody.context: From the Report window, with the Report Outline modified as desired:

step.cmd: Click the Save report design... button above the Report Outline.
Specify filename and choose an appropriate directory for your Report Outline, and click Save.
step.stepresult: The current report design will be saved in the specified directory, and can now be opened for future use in other Query reports. The default directory for saved report designs is the reports folder in the workspace.
